title: Spencer Talks Night One and His Relationship with the Guys
description:
He received the First Impression Rose from Tayshia on "The Bachelorette," and now Spencer is in the hot seat with Rachel and Becca. Spencer discusses how getting the First Impression Rose affected his relationship with the guys in the house. Plus, he recounts night one and admits he regrets the way he came onto the show. 

Then, he plays a game with Becca and Rachel and dishes on all his castmates. 

"Bachelor Happy Hour" has exclusive interviews each and every week. Watch "The Bachelorette" on ABC and listen to "Bachelor Happy Hour" the next morning. 

Don't forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode of Bachelor Happy Hour.
